panels.title: Edit the "Logger Path" variable if the directory where Logger software was installed is not listed

targets.query: SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "Total Events" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY * fill(none)) GROUP BY host fill(none)
SELECT last("BPS_SLC") AS "Bytes/sec" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), Receiver_Type, host fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("BPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), Receiver_Type, host fill(none)
SELECT LAST("ChunkID_Count") AS "Indexing WOS Lag" FROM "exec_Logger_PostgreSQL" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host, * fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/aps.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/mysql_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger WEB " FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/aps.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/mysql_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/aps.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_usage") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/mysql_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none) ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/aps.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '[[logger_path]]current/runtime/mysql_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), host fill(none)
SELECT last("EPS_SLC") as "EPS" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "Processor_Type", host fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY * fill(none)) GROUP BY host fill(none)
SELECT last("BPS_SLC") as "Bytes/sec" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "Processor_Type", host fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Logger
list.name: logger_m
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
